article.name: Spellcraft
article.contents: Uses: - Used to set DCs for spell attacks and to penetrate defenses - Used to cast rituals, ad-hoc spells, any instance where the spell is not thoroughly mastered - Allows access to metamagic
article.bodyHtml:
Uses:

  • Used to set DCs for spell attacks and to penetrate defenses
  • Used to cast rituals, ad-hoc spells, any instance where the spell is not thoroughly mastered
  • Allows access to metamagic
